main event: A round, white-orange streamer was seen as a flash in the sky near McChord AFB.
interesting points: The object lasted for about 20 seconds, being described as slower than a meteor but faster than an aircraft., It was observed in the sky for approximately 3 to 4 seconds., The sighting was categorized as possibly caused by a meteor., The object was originally sighted east of the Fort Lewis firing area., The report also mentions the possibility of aircraft attempting maneuvers involving smoke and fire.
